content.question: How should a stain on a kimono be removed?

choices.label: Lightly clean the spot with diluted detergent
Thoroughly rub special cleaning material into the stain
Avoid using any kind of detergent
Use only water and then air-dry the kimono

content.answer: Lightly clean the spot with diluted detergent
